articles.title: Organ transplant recipients can get Covid even after second vaccine dose: Study - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The findings of a study recently published in the Journal of the American Medical Association has shown that even two doses of Covid-19 vaccine are not enough to fully protect people who have received organ transplants.
articles.content: Researchers at Johns Hopkins have found that two doses of a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 -- the virus that causes Covid-19 -- confers some protection for people who have received solid organ transplant… [+3756 chars]
